bill_title: exempt kerosene from sales and use taxes.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to exempt kerosene from sales and use taxes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-45 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There are hereby specifically exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the amount of tax imposed by it, gross receipts from the sale of kerosene, whether dyed or undyed. Section 2. That chapter 10-46 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There are hereby specifically exempted from the provisions of this chapter and from the computation of the amount of tax imposed by it, gross receipts from the sale of kerosene, whether dyed or undyed. 250 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.038 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
